mdRecord.dcterms:description: a French national service agency under the supervision of the French Ministry of Culture. Its history goes back to the Garde-Meuble de la Couronne, which was responsible for the administration of all furniture and objects in the royal residences. The Mobilier National continues to administer state furniture but has also expanded from its historical role of conserving furniture to curating a modern collection. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mobilier_National [work]
